|Title=Knowing how tobacco is used
|Description=Know
|Rubric=Epidemiology

* '''Slight decrease in overall smoking (2017: 31.8% / 2018: 32%)''''
** decrease in daily smoking (2017: 26.9% / 2018: 25.4%)
** increase in occasional smoking (2017: 4.9% / 2018: 6.6%)

question.question: What happened to smoking habits in 2018 compared to 2017?
question.option_a: There was a significant increase in daily smoking (2017: 26.9% / 2018: 30%)
question.option_b: There was a slight increase in overall smoking (2017: 31.8% / 2018: 32.5%)
question.option_c: There was a slight decrease in overall smoking (2017: 31.8% / 2018: 32%), accompanied by a decrease in daily smoking (2017: 26.9% / 2018: 25.4%)
question.option_d: There was a significant decrease in occasional smoking (2017: 4.9% / 2018: 3.5%)
